dialogues.speaker: . NARRATOR'S VOICE
dialogues.text: (through echo chamber ) - To a man out of the distant past we live in a world of unbelievable magic... At a touch of our fingers we produce light, heat, or sound. Men travel swiftly through the air and beneath the sea. We speak with friends thousands of miles away through a tiny wire... Familiar ‘ things, yet fantastic. ‘Thus, when we enter the realm of the distant past, we must accept the - strange wonders of that time. During last lines of narration, the bow of a ship looms through the fog, its masts outlined faintly against the glowing mist.
